author: ELLE South Africa
title: People Are Applying a Full Face of Makeup to Their Thighs
text:
Redefining the term ‚Äúthighbrow.‚Äù 
Doing makeup on your face is sooo 2015. Putting it on your hands was 2016 . And now that it‚Äôs 2017, the beauty world has evolved so far that people are applying an entire face of makeup to their thighs. Yup. A photo posted by @privarelaxo on Oct 30, 2016 at 8:56pm PDT 
There doesn‚Äôt seem to be any reason for the weird application, other than saving your pores some drama, but it‚Äôs still pretty impressive. I wish my contouring skills were so good I could carve an actual nose out of my thigh. 
A video posted by Aspiring MUA üé® (@beatbylanah) on Jun 18, 2016 at 10:09am PDT A photo posted by Victoria Odom (@makeupbytory_) on Mar 23, 2016 at 6:31am PDT 
A video posted by Malda (@_.malda._) on Sep 15, 2016 at 8:47am PDT 
I think someone took the whole ‚Äúthighbrow‚Äù thing a little too far. 
This article originally appeared on www.elle.com Tags
